parameters.message: I walk towards the shared bathroom. The last time I've been here, I entered the ladies bathroom and found Rokuko.
Weird that she never mentioned that.
Her pie was delicious. If I find her again, I should ask for the recipe...
There's the bathroom. Now I'll make sure to enter the right one and...
"Rokuko!? What are you doing here?"
parameters.name: Hameru Tabe

parameters.message: "What do you mean? I'm washing my face. There's a water shortage on the all boys dorms."
parameters.name: Rokuko

parameters.message: "And that affects you?"
parameters.name: Hameru Tabe

parameters.message: "How would it not?"
parameters.name: Rokuko

parameters.message: "Well... it only affects the boys dorms... And this is the boys bathroom, I made sure this time."
parameters.name: Hameru Tabe

parameters.message: "I don't follow."
parameters.name: Rokuko

parameters.message: "Well... you are a..."
parameters.name: Hameru Tabe

parameters.message: I stop mid-sentence and take a closer look to Rokuko's.
I think I'm stupid.
"Well, I'm a what?"
parameters.name: Rokuko

parameters.message: "Well... You are a guy. A dude. You have a penis, right. So you are on the right place. Don't mind me. My brain is still asleep."
parameters.name: Hameru Tabe

parameters.message: "Oh, I see. You thought I was a girl."
parameters.name: Rokuko

parameters.message: "Me? Nooooooooooo! Nonono. You are clearly a dude."
parameters.name: Hameru Tabe

parameters.message: "It's okay. I like looking like a girl."
parameters.name: Rokuko

parameters.message: "It's okay?"
parameters.name: Hameru Tabe

parameters.message: "Yeah, I'm even flattered. Thanks."
parameters.name: Rokuko

parameters.message: "Oh. Yes. I thought you were a girl. A beautiful one, as a matter of fact..."
parameters.name: Hameru Tabe

parameters.message: "Well, what would you do if I was, in fact, a beautiful girl instead of a dude who looks like a beautiful girl?"
parameters.name: Rokuko

parameters.button0Text: "I would tell you you are in the wrong restroom. Because I've checked this time."
